Consultation closed on 11th June 2019.

Important information for UK colleagues

The final outcome is that

    1) The existing 20% employer contribution will be replaced with a

        - 16% employer contribution

        - Plus, a matching contribution of up to 2%

        - Plus, a 10% uplift to any personal contributions by salary sacrifice

        - Plus, a one-off salary adjustment of 2%

    2) The change is scheduled to take place from January 2020 (though this could still change)

    3) The Aegon annual management charge (0.35%) will continue to be rebated in 2019

    4) 5 AAM funds have been added to the Standard Life Aberdeen GFRP platform

    5) Our advisers at Lemonade will be on hand to support you through the transition

PENSION ALLOWANCES

If your total pension contribution is more than £10,000 per annum you need to check if you are keeping within your Annual Allowance. Many people have now utilised all of their ‘carry forward’ allowances, so could stumble into unexpected tax charges if they don’t take action. The following site is here to help:

ANNUAL AND LIFETIME ALLOWANCE

FUTURE Standard Life Aberdeen GFRP

TALK TO A LEMONADE PENSION ADVISER

Calls can be scheduled with a Lemonade pension adviser if you want help with your pension. This might be to:

• Discuss the difference in charges and funds when moving to Standard Life

• Understand your Annual Allowance

Please email aam@lemonadereward.com to request a call.
